mixed-citation.article-title: Hidden diversity within the Nemastoma bidentatum Roewer, 1914 complex (Opiliones: Nemastomatidae) Part I: Morphological evidence

tp:treatment-sec.p: Typical male hybrids are characterized by Ch-Apo with nearly symetrically convex ventro-anterior margin and straight posterior margin, and club-shaped, robust Pa-Fe with five simple, more or less equidistant ventral Pa-Fe spines in the frontal half, and Pa-Ti with small dorsal hump.
